Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Util::LatticeSystem

Enumeration of the 7 possible Bravais lattice systems.

Allowed values are: Cubic, Tetragonal, Orthorhombic, Monoclinic Triclinic, Rhombohedral, and Hexagonal.
